breath.instruction: Take a deep breath, then blow out as slowly and steadily as you can
Take a deep breath, then count 1, 2, 3... as high as you can on one breath
Take a deep breath, then say 'sssss' for as long as you can
Take a deep breath, then say 'zzzzz' for as long as you can
Breathe deeply into your belly. Feel it expand. Hold for 3 seconds, then exhale slowly.
Take quick, short breaths â€” like a panting dog. Focus on using your diaphragm.

facial.instruction: Smile as wide as you can and hold for the full time
Pucker your lips tightly, like you're kissing, and hold
Move your tongue from one corner of your mouth to the other, slowly
Open your mouth as wide as comfortable and hold
Puff out both cheeks, hold 3 seconds, then release. Repeat.
Press your tongue firmly against the roof of your mouth, hold 3 seconds, release. Repeat.
Alternate between a wide smile and a tight pucker. Slowly.
Slowly move your tongue in a circle around the inside of your lips

warmup.instruction: Hum steadily at a comfortable pitch: Hmmmmmm
Blow air through your lips to make them vibrate (like a horse sound)
Say 'Mah mah mah mah mah' repeatedly, opening wide each time
Say 'Ahhhhhh' as long and loud as you can
Say 'Eeeeee' as long and loud as you can
Say 'Oooooo' as long and loud as you can
